title: Snes emulator and 11.337 roms.
description:
As i uploaded emulator and roms for the 8-bit Nintendo and you loved it,i said to upload also for the 16-bit Nintendo, known as Super Nintendo or Super Famicom.The Super Nintendo was released in Europe between 1990 and 1993.As a successor to the 8-bit Nintendo had  as expected huge success,with million of sales worldwide.The Super Nintendo was a pioneer for the season and leave far behind other 16-bits consoles with the amazing graphics and sound.In this torrent you will find the best emulator for Super Nintendo(znes) as well as all the games ever released for this!have fun!



Instructions:


Because the roms uncompressed is 16.5 giga to don't waste time and bandwidth I the following action,i compressed them with the well-known 7zip and i took just 1.72 giga!The only price is simply taking a few moments to decompress them.Listen to what exactly what you need to do.After download the self-extracted 7zip file unzip it and you are ready.In a few minutes will have decompress all roms. Now I will tell you some information about the emulator.After decompress all the file double-click the file "zsnesw" opens the emulator.To run now one of the games go there that says GAME and after LOAD.Would you open a tab where right would say DIRECTORY and filename left,there which says DIRECTORY locate the ROMS folder and double-click.Left now that it says filename will have all games.Choose whichever  you want and double-click the load.The controls is the cursor keys (the arrows) for the direction the fire buttons are the X,Z,S,A,D,C. The Select is the Right Shift key and the Start Enter.You can of course be changed from the CONFIG-INPUT,also supported all the joypad If you have.For additional information and any questions leave comment.


System requirements:


it is strongly recommended to system:
- Pentium processor (P133 or greater)
- 32MB RAM (min 17.0MB free)
- SVGA card
- Sound Blaster 16 or 100% compatible

Recommended System SuperFX Support:
- Fast Pentium (P200 - P2-300 (depending on the game)
- 32MB RAM (min 17.0MB free)
- VGA card
- Sound Blaster 16 or 100% compatible

running all Windows(32bit/ 64bit)
